# Social Selling

## Quick Start

This skill helps you build relationships and generate pipeline on LinkedIn. For complete strategies, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### LinkedIn Engagement Strategy

- [ ] Optimize profile (headline, summary, banner)
- [ ] Identify target accounts (ICP companies)
- [ ] Follow key decision makers
- [ ] Engage with their content (comment thoughtfully)
- [ ] Share valuable content (3-5x per week)
- [ ] Send personalized connection requests
- [ ] Nurture connections before pitching
- [ ] Track engagement and responses

## Key Frameworks

- **Engagement Ladder**: Follow → Like → Comment → Share → DM → Call
- **Content Mix**: 70% educate, 20% entertain, 10% promote
- **Comment Formula**: Insight + Question (drive conversation)
- **Connection Request**: Mutual interest + Value prop

## Quick Wins

- Comment on prospect posts before cold outreach
- Share their content with your network
- Post consistently (3-5x per week)
- Use LinkedIn Sales Navigator for lead research
